about_the_game:
Azure Ember is a fast-paced crafting roguelike that thrusts you into the heart of a treacherous, ever-changing dungeon. Harvest materials from everything you destroy—crates, creatures, and twisted contraptions—and forge a personalized arsenal to take on relentless enemies and colossal bosses. With each attempt, the dungeon reshapes itself, challenging you to adapt, experiment, and discover new ways to escape the dungeon.

Key Features

  • Forge Your Path to Freedom
    Break apart obstacles and enemies to gather crucial materials, then craft one-of-a-kind weapons. No two runs will ever be the same, thanks to a robust crafting system that rewards your creativity.

  • Explore a Shifting Dungeon
    Descend into a procedurally generated maze full of hidden rooms, secret loot, and unexpected encounters. Adapt your strategy with every twist and turn as you uncover the mysteries lurking in its depths.

  • Battle Monstrous Foes and Mighty Bosses
    From relentless swarms of lesser creatures to gargantuan guardians, danger is always on the horizon. Sharpen your reflexes, perfect your combos, and prepare for epic boss fights that push your skills to the limit.

  • Embrace the Roguelike Challenge
    Death is not the end—it’s just the beginning. Each failed run brings valuable insights, new unlockable blueprints, and a chance to refine your weapon-crafting mastery for the next attempt.

  • Unleash Your Imagination
    Combine salvaged parts into everything from rapid-fire crossbows to giant crushing swords. Mix and match abilities, elemental effects, and special perks to create your personal style of destruction.

Fight through the shadows of the dungeon, experiment with wild crafting possibilities, and carve your own path to escape. Will you harness the dungeon’s secrets, or will they consume you?
